thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 13 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BT Sport Retains Live UK Premier League Rights For 3 More Years From 2019/20 Season​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BT Sport Retains Live UK Premier League Rights For 3 More Years From 2019/20 Season​

organizations.name: bt sport retains live uk premier league

text:
Feb 14 (Reuters) - BT Group Plc:
* ‍BT SPORT RETAINS LIVE UK PREMIER LEAGUE RIGHTS FOR THREE MORE YEARS FROM 2019/20 SEASON​
* ‍RIGHTS WILL COST £295M PER SEASON FOR 32 GAMES.​ * ‍DEPOSIT OF £26.5M IS PAYABLE THIS MONTH FOLLOWED BY SIX INSTALMENTS OF AROUND £145M STARTING IN JULY 2019, PAYABLE EVERY SIX MONTHS UNTIL DEC 2021​
* ‍PREMIER LEAGUE AUCTION REMAINS ONGOING AND BT WILL CONTINUE TO ENGAGE WITH PREMIER LEAGUE REGARDING REMAINING RIGHTS.​ Further company coverage:
